function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Ineffective outbreak role index ori measurement leading to inadequate support and flexibility in healthcare","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring and detection of contagious diseases due to lack of technology for remote continuous patient monitoring","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protocols for identifying, transporting, and managing covid-19 positive cases","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective monitoring and surveillance of contagious diseases","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of quantity in technological advancements for medical field during pandemic outbreaks","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Challenges in tight isolation and containment of covid-19 patients","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research on factors influencing ppe production, distribution, and usage","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Feasibility and cost issues in implementing strategic protocols","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Search databases may not cover all relevant articles related to contagious diseases like covid-19","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sprawling suburban development","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal settlements devoid of governance, design, services, and legal status","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate city infrastructure and design for disease management","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Antimicrobial resistance and bioterrorism threat","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limiting nosocomial spread of infection","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Outbreak of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adverse impact on healthcare industry","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unstructured media dataset","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data duplication in source code repositories leading to rapid evolution and fading out of topics in software engineering","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of lda and nmf for topic modeling and clustering in software engineering and bioinformatics","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of lda and nmf algorithm to analyze covid-19 impact may lead to biased or inaccurate topic detection.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relying solely on sentiment analysis of news and social media to assess the impact of covid-19 on the financial world may lead to incomplete or biased conclusions.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on twitter feed for predicting stock market changes may lead to inaccurate or biased results.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between stock market index, rss, and twitter feeds can lead to misinformation and speculative trading.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate input factors for predicting stock market movement can lead to inaccurate predictions and investment decisions.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of lda algorithm on covid-19 public media dataset","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data cleaning and pre-processing may result in inaccurate modeling and analysis.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate tokenization and n-gram creation can lead to misrepresentation of the text data.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of lda modeling results due to lack of visual representation and interpretability.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate topic modeling leading to misinterpretation of information","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Nmf algorithm not effectively capturing key topics in text data","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of nmf and lda in analyzing covid-19 public media dataset","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in training lda due to time-consuming calculations","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Optimizing hyperparameters using grid search","category":"Data Science","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evaluation of lda models","category":"Data countries","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lockdown measures limit face-to-face interviews for data collection on violence against women.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delays in the availability of data on intimate partner violence due to limited implementation of during the pandemic severely limited services provided to callers","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in accessing microlevel data for calls during 2020","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited availability of microdata for 2020","category":"Data Science","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited availability of data by state for analysis","category":"Data Science","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to services and facilities due to lockdown
